Calibration and validation of interpolation procedures

interpolation_dewtemperature() interpolation_temperature() interpolation_precipitation() interpolation_wind()

Low-level interpolation functions

interpolationpoints() interpolationpixels() interpolationgrid()

Interpolate daily meteorology over a landscape

Bias-correction

Bias-correction functions

correction_series()

Low-level correction functions

correctionpoint() correctionpoints() correctionpoints.errors()

Statistical correction of meteorological variables for a set of points

Weather generation functions

Weather generation

Solar radiation utility functions

I/O

Input/output functions

readNetCDFdates() readNetCDFpoints() readNetCDFgridtopology() readNetCDFproj4string()

Utility functions for NetCDFs

readWindNinjaWindFields()

Reads WindNinja results

readmeteorologygrid() readmeteorologypixels() readmeteorologygridpoints()

Reads gridded meteorology from the disk

readmeteorologypoint() readmeteorologypointfiles() readmeteorologypoints()

Reads point meteorology from the disk

writemeteorologygrid() writeemptymeteorologygrid() writemeteorologypixels() writemeteorologygridpixel()

Writes grid meteorology to the disk

writemeteorologypoint() writemeteorologypointfiles() writemeteorologypoints()

Writes point meteorology to the disk

extractNetCDF()

Extraction of climatic data from NetCDF files (deprecated)

Weather data download

Functions to access daily weather data from national/regional APIs

downloadAEMEThistoricalstationlist() downloadAEMEThistorical() downloadAEMETcurrentday()

Download data from AEMET

downloadMETEOCLIMATICstationlist() downloadMETEOCLIMATICcurrentday()

Download data from Meteoclimatic network

downloadMGstationlist() downloadMGhistorical() downloadMGcurrentday()

Download data from MeteoGalicia

downloadSMCvarmetadata() downloadSMCstationlist() downloadSMCcurrentday() downloadSMChistorical()

Download data from SMC

reshapemeteospain() reshapeworldmet() reshapeweathercan()

Reshapes weather data from 'meteospain', 'worldmet' or 'weathercan'

Utility functions

Meteorological and biophysical utility functions

utils_airDensity() utils_atmosphericPressure() utils_averageDailyVP() utils_averageDaylightTemperature() utils_latentHeatVaporisation() utils_latentHeatVaporisationMol() utils_psychrometricConstant() utils_saturationVP() utils_saturationVaporPressureCurveSlope()

Physical utility functions

penman() penmanmonteith()

Potential evapotranspiration

humidity_specific2relative() humidity_relative2specific() humidity_dewtemperature2relative() humidity_relative2dewtemperature()

Humidity conversion tools

precipitation_concentration() precipitation_rainfallErosivity()

Precipitation utils

meteocomplete()

Complete daily meteorological variables
